419 def create_jwt_token(
420     data: dict,
421     expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None,
422     scopes: Optional[List[str]] = None,
423     plan: str = "FREE",
424     token_type: str = "access",
425 ) -> str:
426     now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
427     default_expire = timedelta(minutes=ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES) if token_type == "access" else timedelta(days=REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRE_DAYS)
428     exp = now + (expires_delta or default_expire)
429     payload = {
430         **data,
431         "exp": int(exp.timestamp()),
432         "iat": int(now.timestamp()),
433         "nbf": int(now.timestamp()),
434         "jti": str(uuid4()),
435         "iss": settings.jwt.issuer,
436         "aud": settings.jwt.audience,
437         "scopes": scopes or PLAN_SCOPES.get(plan.upper(), []),
438         "plan": plan.upper(),
439         "type": token_type,
440     }
441     headers = {"kid": settings.jwt.active_kid} if not JWT_ALGORITHM.startswith("HS") else None
442     return jwt.encode(payload, _jwt_signing_key(), algorithm=JWT_ALGORITHM, headers=headers or {})
